Cambodia: The royal Khmer court moves to Longvek.
Colombia: Rodrigo de Bastidas founded the village of Santa Marta
Estonia: The Teutonic Order is secularized and the Livonian Order becomes de facto independent.
France: Battle of Pavia. Francis is defeated by Imperial forces under Charles V and captured.
Germany: German Peasants' War: The war ended in the defeat of the peasant army. Prussian Homage: Grand Master Albert of the Teutonic Order resigned his position and was appointed duke of Prussia by the Polish king Sigismund I the Old.
Philippine: Spain sends an expedition under Juan Garcia Jofre de Loaysa to the Philippines. The Loaysa Expedition failed
Poland:
Signing of the Treaty of Kraków
Prussian Homage
Sweden: First Dalecarlian Rebellion occurs in parallel with attempt by Christina Gyllenstierna and Sören Norby to take Swedish throne
Taiwan: Some merchants from Fujian are able to speak Formosan languages
